Title: A Taxonomy of Multilingual and Plurilingual Digital Lexicographical Resources: Classification, Criteria, and Prototyping Degree

Abstract:
This paper aims to present a comprehensive classification of multilingual and plurilingual digital lexicographical resources. Our goal is to establish a typology of these tools, distinguishing them from platforms and websites, through the application of both quantitative and qualitative criteria. The proposed taxonomy will facilitate a better understanding of various multilingual lexicographical resources and their unique characteristics.

This paper not only offers an extensive description of different multilingual and plurilingual digital lexicographical resources but also provides parameters and typological proposals to define and demarcate them. Furthermore, we discuss the objective of studying multilingual and plurilingual lexicography and challenge the boundaries of this field.
